about_the_game:
Dive into Riders of Icarus with a package that provides all the utilities needed to stand amongst the defenders of light. The Novitiate Essentials Package provides Riders with the following:

Mount: Panoku

EliteTitle
  • Effect: Rare Drop Chance +5%

Premium Service (14 Day)
Defense Boost Talisman (14 Day)
General Boost Talisman (14Day)

Bag (16 Slot) x2
Ellun (10 Pack) x14

Experience Tincture I (3 Hour)

Limit 1 Novitiate Essentials Package per account. Packages are not transferable.
